message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll find it incredibly valuable. I'm asking for $200 to start the negotiations.
Alice, $200 is a bit too steep for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $120. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $200 represents the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $170. This offer reflects a fair compromise.
Alice, I understand your position, but $170 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $140.  This would give us both a fair deal.
